column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Otumfo no nnhyɛ ber nntua emumuyɛfo kaw? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hɔn a wonyim no nnhu dɛm ber no?"
"Binom wɔ hɔ a hɔn dze
column3: wɔtwe asaase he; Wɔfa nguankuw enyimpido

column2: "Wɔka egyanka n’asoaso ma ɔkɔ
column3: Wɔgye ɔbaa kunafo ne nantwi ahoba."

column2: "Woyi ɔkɔhweaban edzi wɔ kwan mu: Wɔpam asaase do ehiafo kɔ nsumaa mu."
"Dɛ mbrɛ sar do hamu nsoasopɔnkɔ pue kɔhwehwɛ edziban no
column3: Dɛmara so na ehiafo no pue kɔhwehwɛ edziban mbɔdzen do ara; Sar no do na wonya edziban ma hɔn mba."

column2: "Haban mu na wotwa hɔn mbowa edziban; Na wodzi ndzebɔnyɛfo wenyin ture mu mpɛpɛw."
"Anadwe nyinara wodzi adagyaw da dɛ wonnyi adzefuradze
column3: Na wonnyi akataho wɔ awɔw mu."

column2: "Mbepɔw do nsutɔree fɔw hɔn
column3: Na wonnyi guansumabew ntsi wɔyɛ ɔbotan etuu."

column2: "Binom wɔ hɔ a wɔtsew ngyanka fi enumfo ano
"Ma wɔnenam no adagyaw mu a wonnyi adzefuradze
"Wɔyɛ ngo wɔ hɔn afasu mu; Wotsiatsia hɔn nsatwer  do
column4: " #24.11 NSATWER: Bea a wokyikyi wenyinaba dze yɛ nsa."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔda wuso no apensi fow fi kurow no mu. Na epirafo no hɔn akra su frɛ mboa; Naaso Nyankopɔn nnhu no dɛ emumuyɛdze a."
"Woyinom na wɔtsew etua wɔ kan no do; Wonnyim n’akwan
"Wudzifo dzi kan soɛr ber a adze asa no
column3: na oku hianyi na kɔhweaban; Na anadwe ɔyɛ dɛ wifo."

column2: "Ɔyefafo enyiwa so tweɔn adansaber
column4: Enyiwa bi nnkohu me: Na ɔdze akataho kata n’enyim."

column2: "Sum mu na wobubu adan mu: Naaso obodu enyim kan no
column4: Na wɔnnye kan nnyi hwee yɛ."

column2: "Na hɔn nyinara anapa yɛ hɔn dɛ wu no nwinwin
column3: Osiandɛ wonyim no mu dza oyi hu."

column2: "Wɔyɛ ehur wɔ nsu enyi; Wɔdom hɔn kyɛfa wɔ asaase do: Na obiara nnkɔ wenyin nture no mu."
"Dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyew na nsukɔm nan esukwankyɛba no: Dɛmara so na samanadze dze yɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ bɔn no."
"Awotoa werɛ befir hɔn; nsunsuma bedzi hɔn nam; Wɔrennkaa hɔn bio: Na emumuyɛfo bobubu dɛ dua."
"Wɔmemen bɔnyin a onnyi ba no: Na wɔnnyɛ ɔbaa kunafo ayamuyie."
"Naaso Nyankopɔn dze no tum yi akatakyi fi hɔ: Wotum nya asetsena pa
column3: naaso wonnya nkwa ho enyidado biara."

column2: "Nyankopɔn ma hɔn asetsena yɛ dwudwoodwo
column3: na wɔdze hɔnho twer iyi; Na n’enyiwa wɔ hɔn akwan do."

column2: "Woehuhor hɔn; naaso mber kakrabaabi na wonnyi hɔ; Nyew
column4: oyi hɔn fi kwan no mu dɛ nyimpa nyinara
column5: Na wotwitwa hɔn gu dɛ eburow mbɛtsem."

column2: "Ana ɔnntse dɛm a? Afei woana na ɔbɔbɔ me ɔtor
column3: Na ɔakyerɛ dɛ aba biara nnyi m’asɛm yi mu?"
